name: Pac-Man SDL
description:
Controls:

ESC: Exit Game
F11: Toggle Fullscreen

Keyboard:

- ARROW KEYS: Move
- Z: Charge Dash
- X: Back

Controller:

- D-PAD: Move
- A: OK
- B: Back
- X: Charge Dash

Special Items:

Mirror: Create a mirror image of Pac-Man that can help you collect dots and eat ghosts?
Roller Skates: Give Pac-Man a temporary speed boost to outrun ghosts
Shield: Temporarily protect Pac-Man from all harm
Stop Watch: Stop the ghosts in their tracks!

Credits:

Programming:

  • John Blat

Art:

  • Stephen Bath
  • Colton Powell

Music:

  • Main Menu:
    • **Trust Relax Autopilot** by Broken Groove
  • Game Music: 
    • **DisFunkTional** by ThatAndyGuy
    • **Don't Worry We've Got Warp Speed** by Broken Groove
    • **Rock Paper Funk Take Off** by Broken Groove
